text: On the other hand, several genes showing very high increase of expression in all or particular tested groups of animals (Table S1 ) have been identified as interferon stimulated genes (ISGs): OAS 1 (2′-5′-oligoadenylate synthase 1), MX1 (Myxovirus influenza virus resistance), IFIT1 (interferon-induced protein with tetratricopeptide repeats 1), IFIT2 (interferon-induced protein with tetratricopeptide repeats 2), IFIT3 (interferon-induced protein with tetratricopeptide repeats 3) and ISG15, what shows that all PRRSV strains used in the study activated interferon-induced antiviral response to some degree.
